column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This is a great place to take out of town visitors. The atmosphere of the restaurant is very warm and inviting
column2: and the tapas make it easy for everyone to find something that they like. I haven't been to many tapas restaurants (pretty much just this one and Iberico)
column3: and while Iberico seems to be more 'authentic
column4: ' I like Ba-Ba-Reeba because of the atmosphere AND because they take reservations.
